description: a json object with identifier and attributes for your input sample - eg sra-accession, size-in-MB
name: input_attrs

description: the path to the task workflow script
name: task_path

description: the gcp storage path where the task outputs should be written
name: task_output_path

description: the priority of the task. 1 is the highest priority
name: task_priority

description: the id for the lifesciences operation in which the task is being run.
name: task_operation

description: the time at which the task was enabled to be run
name: task_ready_event

description: the time at which the task processing commenced
name: task_trying_event

description: the time at which the task started running in lifesciences
name: task_running_event

description: the time at which the task processing was completed successfully
name: task_succeeded_event

description: the time at which the task processing failed
name: task_failed_event
